name: Dataload Flex Template
description: Flex template that reads DynamoDB Export data from GCS and writes to Bigtable using a Control File

parameters.name: controlFilePath
parameters.label: Control File Path
parameters.helpText: GCS Path to the JSON control file defining mapping and settings.

parameters.name: inputFilePath
parameters.label: GCS Input filepath (Override)
parameters.helpText: Optional override for input filepath. If not provided, uses sourceFileLocation from control file.

parameters.name: bigtableSplitLargeRows
parameters.label: Bigtable Split Large Rows
parameters.helpText: Define if we want to split large rows when writing to Bigtable

parameters.name: bigtableMaxMutationsPerRow
parameters.label: Bigtable Max Mutations Per Row
parameters.helpText: Define the maximum number of mutations per Bigtable row
